abstract: FIFA president Gianni Infantino is told at women's soccer and leadership conference at organization's headquarters in Zurich that women's soccer is crucial to future of international soccer as it is as yet untapped source of revenue.

headline.main: Billie Jean King Calls for Equality in Soccer

snippet: Gianni Infantino, the recently elected FIFA president, was told that women should be part of the solution to the problems that have plagued FIFA.
lead_paragraph: Gianni Infantino, the recently elected FIFA president, was told that women should be part of the solution to the problems that have plagued FIFA.
